items.title: Finite Moments of QSD
items.content:
715: :label: cor-cg-qsd-moments
716: 
717: The QSD $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$ has finite moments of all orders:
718: 
719: $$
720: \int_{\Sigma_N} \|\mathcal{S}\|^p \, \pi_{\text{QSD}}(\mathrm{d}\mathcal{S}) < \infty
721: $$

items.label: cor-cg-area-law
items.title: Area Law for Crystalline Gas
items.content:
1868: :label: cor-cg-area-law
1869: 
1870: The Crystalline Gas gauge theory ({prf:ref}`def-cg-dynamics`) exhibits an **area law** for Wilson loops:
1871: 
1872: $$
1873: \langle W_{\mathcal{C}} \rangle_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}} \leq e^{-\sigma \mathcal{A}(\mathcal{C})}
1874: $$
1875: 
1876: where the string tension satisfies:
1877: 
1878: $$
1879: \sigma \geq c_0 \cdot \lambda_0 > 0
1880: $$
1881: 
1882: with $\lambda_0$ from {prf:ref}`thm-cg-spectral-gap` and $c_0$ a universal constant.
